title: Optimizing Swimming Fantasy Teams Under Constraints

abstract.description: Optimization problem to select the best swimming team to maximize points under constraints.

detail.context: Fantasy swimming game with a large number of participants and scoring rules.
detail.approach: Used spreadsheet formulas and manual optimization to select the best team.
detail.solution_description: Designed a model in Google Sheets to compute scores and simulate different team combinations.
detail.pros: Quick implementation, good ranking among thousands of participants.
detail.cons_and_improvements_ideas: Not fully automated, presentation of sheet can be improved for professional use.
